WorkItem.Description:
Description -   In the buffs tab, Indestructible potions (in addition to Insane Strength, Potions of Speed, Heroic Potions, Potions of Wild Magic (really?), Potions of Mighty Rage(REALLY?)) don't give any buff when their box is checked (or, such as Wild Magic/Mighty Rage, probably should be included at all).  In the comparisons (the graph area on the right) > Buffs > Potions area, these potions have a buff value of 0, each.  
Â 
Steps to Reproduce - 
1) Load Rawr
2) Load a character (such as the attached file)
3) In the Slot: Gear drop-down menu, go down to buffs > all buffs
4) In the sub-menu, choose potions.
5) Observe a lack of buff values for the potions I listed.
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Various potions do not give a bonus if used

FileAttachments.FileName: SageofTimes Tank DK ID potion test.xml
